ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And what will convey to you what Sijjin is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How will you comprehend what Sijjin is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And how would you know what the Record of the prison-house is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Would that you knew what Sijin is!?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And what do you know, how (wretched) the Sijjeen is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And what will make you know what Sijjin is
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what will make you know what the Sijjin is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and what shall teach thee what is Sijjin?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ah! what will convey unto thee what Sijjin is! -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and what could make you understand what the Sijjin is? --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And what will make thee know whatsoever the record in Sijjin is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And what will show you what is Sijjeen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And what will explain to thee what Sijjin is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And what will make you know what Sijjin is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What could let you know what the Sijjeen is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But how can you know what Sijjeen is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:8] And what would tell you what Sijjīn is?, what the book of Sijjīn is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Ah! what will convey unto thee what Sijjin is) what is in Sijjin! This is mentioned by way of aggrandizement of Sijjin.
